Chamber_ID: Unique chamber label; must appear in chamber data table as well
Timestamp_Begin: ISO timestamp begin of averaging period (up to a 12-digit integer as specified by the data's temporal resolution)
Timestamp_End: ISO timestamp END of averaging period (up to a 12-digit integer as specified by the data's temporal resolution)
Flux_CO2: CO2 flux (positive = to atmosphere); negative values are also acceptable
Dry_CO2: Mean chamber CO2 concentration during measurement period
Flux_SE_CO2: Standard error of CO2 flux computation
CrvFit_CO2: CO2 flux computation method (“Lin” or “Exp” for linear and exponential)
Error: Error generated by analyzer or during import
CO2_Amb: Ambient CO2 concentration at measurement location
Tair_Amb: Ambient air temperature at measurement location
PAR: Photosynthetically active radiation inside measurement chamber
PAR_Amb: Photosynthetically active radiation outside measurement chamber
VPD_Amb: Vapor pressure deficit at measurement location
Tx: Soil temperature at x cm (for additional "Tx" fields, follow same format, e.g. T5, T15)
SMx: Volumetric soil moisture at x cm depth (for additional "SMx" fields, follow the same format, e.g. SM5, SM15)
Soil_O2: Soil oxygen level at measurement chamber
WTD: Water table depth at measurement location, positive numbers are depth
